direct_answer.text:

    Remaining calories: 2000 - 1800 = 200

   Grams of chips to consume: 200 / 4 = 50

So, you can eat around 50 grams of chips as the remaining calories would be enough to cover those calories.

Note: The actual number of calories in chips varies depending on the brand and flavor, so this is just an estimate based on the provided information.
